overview:
Nir masters all aspects of online marketing:SEM, SEO, SMO, CRO, EMM, Media Buy and Affiliates networks.

He has distinguished record in helping companies in a wide range of industries from travel, financial, insurance, technology and non-profit organizations. Fully in charge of operating SEVEN digits online campaigns budget in multiple languages and sources, recruitment and training of marketing teams - SEM, PPC, SEO, SMM, CRO and wide experience in Managing and operating out-sourced and external companies.

Nir possess unique ability for accurately assessing products, competitors, industries, and service offerings to develop innovative strategies and campaigns that attract buyers and create a strong brand image.

In his last role he acquired also project management expertise - Full life-cycle from initial planning through final delivery â€“ budgets, negotiation, schedules, resources, tracking and analyzing.
